      • canBuy

        public boolean canBuy()
        This function is used to determine if a player has enough resources to buy an object (road settlement, city) I don't currently know what object would store the build requirements for each object, but that would be passed in as a parameter
        Returns:
        whether the object passed in can be built.

      • buy

        public void buy()
        This function is used to buy an object I don't currently know what object would store the build requirements for each object, but that would be passed in as a parameter. If the requirements are met, the number of resources would be removed from resources

      • canBuyDevCard

        public boolean canBuyDevCard()
        This function is used to determine if the player can buy a dev card
        Returns:
        returns true if the player can, false otherwise

      • buyDevCard

        public void buyDevCard()
        This function is used to buy a dev card

      • canUseDevCard

        public boolean canUseDevCard(DevCardType type)
        This function is used to determine if a dev card can be played
        Parameters:
        type - the type of dev card
        Returns:
        true if player owns dev card

      • useDevCard

        public void useDevCard(DevCardType type)
        this function is used when a player plays a dev card to decrement the type of dev card owned by the player
        Parameters:
        type - type of dev card played
